hero.description: I craft scalable, high-performance digital solutions. Specializing in modern web technologies, I transform complex requirements into seamless, user-centric experiences.

api.desc: Developing and integrating robust RESTful and GraphQL APIs for seamless data communication.

deployment.desc: Setting up CI/CD pipelines, cloud hosting (AWS/Vercel), and optimizing server performance.
